name: Abandoned Knight
description: The adventures of the young knight begin in an abandoned building where no one expected to find mysterious occurences or the presence of dark powers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: with 32 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 8 DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 90 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Additional Notes: No Steam overlay support

reviews.review_text: Completely unplayable. I bought it for the cards. I don't recommend doing the same.
Does this remind anybody else of the graphics for Pixel Dungeon?  Game is barely a YES...
